resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77268</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77268</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>03f5ce15-cb33-4adb-baa6-a0692ff23913#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Tapír</string>
            <string language="en">Tapir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tapir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tapir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tapir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tapir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Tapir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tapir</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A páratlanujjú patások közé tartozik. A dél-amerikai trópusi esőerdők vízpartjain él.</string>
            <string language="en">Belongs to odd-toed ungulates. Lives in the banks of the South American rain forests.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  páratlanujjú patások,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, odd-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehört ungerad-odd-toed ungulates. Leben in
den Bänken der südamerikanischen Regenwälder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appartient aux ungulates impair-bottés avec la 
pointe du pied. Les vies aux banques des forêts tropicales 
américaines du sud.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pertence aos ungulates impar-odd-toed. Vidas
nos bancos das florestas de chuva do americano sul.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appartiene ai ungulates dispari-piantati. 
Vite nella banca delle foreste di pioggia sudamericane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανήκει περίεργος- ungulates. Ζωές στις 
τράπεζες των νότιων αμερικανικών τροπικών δασών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pertenece a los ungulates impar-tocados con la 
punta del pie. Vidas en las baterías de las selvas tropicales 
suramericanas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, ungerad-odd-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les mammifères, placentalia, impair-ont botté des ungulates 
avec la pointe du pied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os mamíferos, placentalia, impar-odd-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i mammiferi, placentalia, dispari-hanno piantato i ungulates di 
traverso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τα θηλαστικά, placentalia, περίεργος- ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los mamíferos, placentalia, impar-tocaron con la punta del pie 
ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77268</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=03f5ce15-cb33-4adb-baa6-a0692ff23913&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
